fields.description: It's a good timing to check other configurations about hdfs-default.xml here.
fields.summary: dfs.checksum.type is not described in hdfs-default.xml

comments.body: After verifying I found one more configuration 'dfs.namenode.decommission.nodes.per.interval' is missing in hdfs-default.xml
[~gururaj] Great. Do you mind creating a patch?

Hi [~ozawa]
Attached the patch, kindly review and let me know for any changes.
